name: Manufacture Salve
effect: The alchemist manufactures gross material in the form of a salve, cream or unguent, formulated to contain a particular spell effect. To be imprinted in a salve, a spell must protect the beneficiary from harm or influence. The effect of the imprinted spell is triggered when the salve is rubbed on the beneficiary's body. The salve can be applied by the beneficiary or by another individual.

rotes.roteDescription: Before battle, commandos of the Adamantine Arrow douse themselves in armoring unguents, such as those imprinted with the Life 3 spell Organic Shield.
